contact.name: Mauno Vihinen
contact.address: Institute of Medical Technology ,FI-33014 University of Tampere, Finland

acknowledgement.name: Tampere University Hospital Medical Research Fund

comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing

generalized excema, recurrent severe infections of the skin and respiratory tract that required episodes of hospitalization, recurrent episodes of pneumonia, chronic diarrhea, prolonged varicella complicated with bacterial infection, recurrent herpes zoster keratitis and uveitis of the left eye with progressive loss of visual activity, chronic lung disease with signs of chronic hypoxemia, congenital GH deficiency
persistently low growth rate and severe growth failure, prominent fore-head, saddle nose, and high-pitched voice

consequence.term: A point mutation in the exon 5 leading to a premature stop codon

comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing
short stature, congenital ichthyosis, hemorrhagic chickenbox

consequence.term: A frame shift duplication mutation in the exon 9 leading to a premature stop codon

comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing
Severe growth failure, a history of pruritic skin lesions and recurrent pulmonary infections

consequence.term: a frame shift duplication mutation in the exon 10 leading to a premature stop codon

comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing

Respiratory difficulties with oxygen requirements, lymphoid interstitial pneumonia, multiple episodes of bronchial obstruction, hemorrhagic varicella, several episodes of herpes zoster. Patient had a prominent forehead, a saddle nose and a high-pitched voice.

consequence.term: a point mutation in the exon 15 leading to an amino acid change in the SH2 domain
